Context: thank you for shopping with acmebrands! how may i help you? i am thinking of buying a michael kors jacket. is it easy to get a stain out of it? there are a lot of steps, but each one is very quick when it comes to what you need to do. would you like to know how to do it? yes. first, get a cotton cloth wet and gently dab the stain. then put some salt on the stain and let it sit for at least five minutes so it can absorb the extra water. then you'll need to pour boiled water on the stained area to flush it out. thanks. next, wash the jacket on the hottest water setting to get rid of any remaining marks. dry either on a line or on low-heat in your dryer. that's it!
